title: And this week’s lucky winners are… – HERITAGE
text:
You’ve indulged, you got creative and snapped away at your favourite pork dishes with us.

We’ve loved and salivated over the many sizzling submissions that we’ve received thus far and we have chosen our second group of winners, who will each receive a R1000 Food Lovers’ Market pork voucher!

Taliza

Joy

Zasha

Daniel

Stefan

To stand a chance to win, upload a picture of your favourite pork dish to the WIN page. Remember to include yourself and your favourite people in your uploads to stand an even greater chance of winning.

Keep entering and check back to see if you’re one of next week’s lucky winners!
